title: Emergency Response Activation
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want to quickly initiate emergency alerts through a simple voice command so that I can receive prompt assistance in crisis situations without feeling monitored.

title: Medication Reminder System
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want to set and receive reminders for my medication intake and refills using voice commands so that I can maintain my health independently without feeling monitored.

title: Intuitive User Interface Design
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want ALFRED to have an easy-to-navigate interface so that I can manage my daily tasks independently without feeling overwhelmed.

title: Personalized Interaction History
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want to easily access a history of my interactions with ALFRED so that I can review previous commands and responses without feeling overwhelmed.

title: Social Engagement Tracking
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want ALFRED to track my participation in social activities and provide motivational feedback so that I can stay engaged and maintain my social connections without feeling monitored.

title: Assisted Setup for Non-Tech Savvy Users
summary: As an older adult, I want an assisted setup option that guides me through installation and configuration so that I can easily start using ALFRED without needing external help.

title: Flexible Activity Scheduling
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want to customize my schedule for physical and cognitive activities so that I can align them with my daily routines and preferences without feeling overwhelmed.
